name: MealBuddy
0:
”Alexa, open Meal Buddy”
”Alexa, start Meal Buddy”
”Alexa, begin Meal Buddy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meal buddy
des:
Meal Buddy is a parent's dream come true. Alexa can now help you finish your meal, entertaining you with jokes, facts, and music. You will also be reminded to chew every once in a while. Just say, "Alexa, open Meal Buddy." You will then be asked your name and how long you are eating for.

Tell us what you think at awesomeaariv.com

Music credit: orangefreesounds.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
